backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and a contact ticket system with auto-initialized admin and permissions enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading the main TypeScript React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling the site's main sections including header, hero, services, contact, tracking, admin, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable UI showing an access denied message with alert styling for non‑admin users.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderManage: Admin-only interface for creating orders, updating statuses, and listing all orders with permission checks and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Contact form component with validation, async submission, success message handling, and integration with backend mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, CTAs, and scroll-to-section handlers.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that triggers Internet Identity login/logout and shows status states.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Displays service tier cards with pricing, features, and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, quick‑link navigation using scroll, and social media links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, mobile menu, admin link logic, and scroll-to-section behavior.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Order tracking form that queries tracking data, displays progress, status badges, and step details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
Provides React Query hooks for creating, updating, and retrieving orders and checking admin status through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing identities, login state, and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting contact form data through the actor API and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Exposes a mutation hook to fetch tracking state and optional order status, handling not-found and error cases.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with additional utilities and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-aware URLs for static assets using the app’s configured BASE_URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests focused on auto-granting admin access via Internet Identity.
